彼一時此一時.pinyin: bi3 yi1 shi2 ci3 yi1 shi2
彼一時此一時.definition: that was one thing, and this is another; times have changed

彼倡此和.definition: to chorus sb else's lead (idiom); to chime in in agreement

彼唱此和.definition: to chorus sb else's lead (idiom); to chime in in agreement

彼岸花.definition: red spider lily (Lycoris radiata); cluster amaryllis

彼得前書.definition: First Epistle of Peter (in New Testament)

彼得後書.definition: Second Epistle of Peter (in New Testament)

彼得格勒.definition: Petrograd (former name of Saint Petersburg 聖彼得堡|圣彼得堡[Sheng4bi3de2bao3])

彼拉多.definition: Pilate (Pontius Pilate in the Biblical passion story)

彼此彼此.definition: (idiom) you and me both; that makes two of us

彼爾姆.definition: Perm, Russian city in the Urals
